name: Comwell Copenhagen Portside Dolce by Wyndham
description: Comwell Copenhagen Portside Dolce by Wyndham has a fitness centre, garden, a shared lounge and restaurant in Copenhagen. Featuring a bar, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation features room service, a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage for guests. All rooms at the hotel are fitted with a seating area and a flat-screen TV with cable channels. At Comwell Copenhagen Portside Dolce by Wyndham the rooms include bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers a buffet or continental breakfast. Comwell Copenhagen Portside Dolce by Wyndham offers a sun terrace. Guests can make use of the business centre or relax in the snack bar. Svanemolle Beach is 2 km from the hotel, while Parken Stadium is 2.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Copenhagen Airport, 11 km from Comwell Copenhagen Portside Dolce by Wyndham.

name: Copenhagen Marriott Hotel
description: Experience a luxury getaway at Copenhagen Marriott Hotel, one of the finest modern hotels in Denmark. Discover spacious, beautifully appointed hotel rooms that rank among some of the largest in Copenhagen, Denmark. Each is a downtown oasis with complimentary Wi-Fi access, a sleek marble bathroom, flat-screen TV and floor-to-ceiling windows that showcase mesmerizing views of the Copenhagen city center. Indulge in international cuisine and captivating harbor views from our restaurants and bars, including a beautiful outdoor terrace. Host impressive business meetings and conferences in our modern, canal-view venues. With a picturesque waterfront location in Copenhagen city center, we're near Tivoli Gardens, Harbor Beach, and famed Stroget Street. The Copenhagen Marriott Hotel provides an ideal backdrop for business and leisure guests alike.Marriott

name: AC Hotel by Marriott Bella Sky Copenhagen
description: Experience 4-star sophistication in Denmark's capital city with the beautifully-designed accommodations and deluxe amenities at AC Hotel Bella Sky Copenhagen. Boasting a location near the airport and the vibrant city center, our hotel is steps away from the train station which allows for easy exploration of local attractions including Tivoli Gardens and Amager Common. Unpack your bags in modern hotel rooms with pillow top bedding, floor-to-ceiling windows and authentic Danish design. Then explore our hotel's luxurious amenities, including a fitness center and delicious restaurants. Start your day with the hot breakfast buffet and savor locally-sourced fare for lunch or dinner. If visiting Copenhagen for business, plan your next successful event in the adjacent Bella Center and tackle projects with our hotel's complimentary Wi-Fi, parking and on-site business center. We're ready to make your visit memorable at AC Hotel Bella Sky Copenhagen.Marriott

name: Cph Hotel
description: Next to the trendy Kødbyen district, CPH Hotel is less than 1 km from City Hall Square. All rooms have cable TV and free WiFi. The Scandinavian-style rooms at CPH Hotel have wooden floors and light, spacious bathrooms with hair dryers. Room furnishings include a work desk and an armchair. Guests can enjoy breakfast at the outdoor terrace during the summer months. Tivoli Gardens and Copenhagen Central Station are a 4-minute walk from the hotel. Copenhagen International Airport is 20 minutes from the hotel by train.

name: Kurhotel Skodsborg
description: Kurhotel Skodsborg offers two restaurants on site and free parking. The spa features a sauna and hot tub. A wide range of massage, spa and beauty treatments can also be booked. Copenhagen is just a 20 minutes' drive away. At Kurhotel Skodsborg, all rooms include a TV, seating area and private bathroom. WiFi is free. The sea-view restaurant offers modern Nordic fine dining with seasonal ingredients, herbs from the garden and freshly-baked breads. The comprehensive wine list completes the dining experience. The Brasserie offers more casual dining yet still focused on local produce. In the lobby, guests can take a coffee break, browse the reading collection or simply relax. Bicycles can be rented on site. Skodsborg Strand Park is 250 metres away. Skodsborg Station is a 10-minute walk from Skodsborg Kurhotel.

name: Hotel Scheelsminde
description: This quiet, family-owned property, set in a country house from the early 1800s, is 5 minutes’ drive from Aalborg Train Station. It offers a gourmet restaurant, wellness centre and rooms with flat-screen TVs. Wi-Fi and parking are free. Tea/coffee facilities, cable TV channels and desks are standard at Hotel Scheelsminde. Blackout curtains and a private bathroom with shower are also included. Restaurant Scheelsminde’s seasonal menu offers classic Danish and international dishes from Monday until Saturday. Guests can relax on the terrace or play boules in the garden. The wellness centre features a swimming pool, hot tub and sauna. Kunsten Museum of Modern Art is a 10-minute drive from Hotel Scheelsminde. Mariendals Mølle Bus Stop is just around the corner from the hotel.

name: Skagen Harbour Hotel
description: Situated by Skagen Harbour, this property provides free WiFi and parking. It offers rooms just 5 minutes’ walk from sandy beaches. Skagen Train Station is 1 km away. Skagen Harbour Hotel’s light, airy accommodation features a minibar, flat-screen TV and private bathroom. Guests can sit in the cosy dining room or enjoy Skagen’s famous bright summer nights on the main terrace. There is also a daytime bar. Sct. Laurentii Vej, the main shopping street, is 300 metres from Skagen Harbour Hotel. The 14th-century Buried Church is an 8-minute drive away. The Swedish Seaman's Church is next to the hotel.

name: Radisson Blu Papirfabrikken Hotel, Silkeborg
description: This hotel is housed in a former paper mill by the Gudenå River, 10 minutes’ walk from Silkeborg Museum. Guests can enjoy free internet access and free parking. A tea/coffee maker, minibar and cable TV are featured in all rooms at Radisson Blu Hotel i Papirfabrikken Silkeborg. Bathrobes and slippers, are found in some rooms. Facilities at Hotel i Papirfabrikken include a restaurant, bar and terrace with river views. Guests receive a discount to the gym housed in the same building. The area's surrounding lakes offer activities such as hiking, fishing and sailing. Silkeborg Golf Course is only a 10-minute drive away.

name: Hotel Skivehus
description: Located 29 km from Jesperhus Resort, Hotel Skivehus offers 3-star accommodation in Skive and features a fitness centre, a garden and a shared lounge. The hotel also features free WiFi as well as a paid airport shuttle service. All units in the hotel are equipped with a TV with satellite channels. Hotel Skivehus provides certain rooms that include city views, and each room includes a private bathroom with a shower. At the accommodation the rooms come with bed linen and towels. Guests at Hotel Skivehus can enjoy a gluten-free breakfast. Guests at the hotel will be able to enjoy activities in and around Skive, like hiking and cycling. The nearest airport is Midtjyllands Airport, 36 km from Hotel Skivehus.

name: Montra Skaga Hotel
description: Skaga Hotel is conveniently located just 100 metres from Nordsøen Oceanarium. It offers free on-site parking and rooms with free WiFi. Color Line Ferry Terminal is just 500 metres away, while Fjord Line and Smyril Line Ferry Terminals are 1.5 km away. All rooms at Hotel Skaga have a TV, a seating area and a work desk. The rooms come with a bathroom and shower. Guests can enjoy a game of table tennis or pool in the games room or relax in the sauna. The Panorama Restaurant offers a buffet breakfast, à la carte dishes, daily specials and a children's menu. Drinks are available in the cosy lounge area. Lilleheden Train Station is a 3-minute walk away. Hirtshals Golf Club is 4 km from the hotel.

name: Radisson Blu Royal Viking Hotel, Stockholm
description: This hotel is situated beside Central Station, 8 minutes’ walk from Stockholm Town Hall. Guests enjoy free entrance to the gym. The entrance fee for pool and saunas is 200 SEK. Breakfast is free for children under 7 years, while children up to 12 years have a discount. All the air-conditioned guest rooms at Radisson Blu Royal Viking have luxury beds and a bathtub or shower. Each room features a satellite TV and minibar. The in-house restaurant Stockholm Fisk serves internationally inspired cuisine, while HIGH - Cocktail Bar on the 9th floor offers city views. Archipelago boat trips depart from 2 nearby harbours and the Arlanda Express airport train departs from beside the Royal Viking. Drottninggatan shopping street is just a 5-minute walk away and the Old Town is a 15-minute walk away.

name: Clarion Collection Hotel Tapto
description: The Clarion Collection Hotel Tapto is ideally located close to the Museum of National Antiquities, Junibacken storybook house and theme park, Nordic Museum, Strindberg Museum, Aquaria Water Museum and Skansen, the oldest open-air museum in the world and also a zoological park. Enjoy hotel amenities like a restaurant, guest laundry facilities, a cocktail lounge, free organic breakfast, a light evening buffet, free weekday newspapers, free coffee, meeting space and coffee, tea and fruit available 24 hours a day, to name a few. Guest rooms have cable TVs. Some rooms have trouser presses. Book a room today.Choice Hotels

name: Berns, Historical Boutique Hotel & House of Entertainment since 1863
address: Berzelii Park, Näckstroemsgatan 8, Stockholm, Stockholms Lan
description: Berns, a historical boutiques hotel and house of entertainment since 1863, has 82 personally decorated rooms, 2 restaurants, several night clubs/bars and a large selection of meeting and event venues. The hotel offers the full range of on-site amenities and services like 24 hours room service and Concierge Welcome to the world of Berns!iHotelier/iStay

name: Elite Hotel Arcadia
description: Set in a stylish 1950s building in fashionable Östermalm, this hotel is 15 minutes’ walk from Stureplan. It offers free Wi-Fi internet and rooms with LCD TVs and blackout curtains. Elite Hotel Arcadia’s rooms feature fresh design, modern décor and air conditioning. All bathrooms have heated towel racks and free toiletries. Guests are offered both classic international dishes and traditional Swedish cuisine at the in-house restaurant. Elite Arcadia is 5 minutes’ walk from Tekniska Högskolan Metro Station, which is 3 stops from Stockholm Central Station. The picturesque island of Djurgården is a 20-minute bus ride away.

name: Radisson Blu Waterfront Hotel, Stockholm
address: Nils Ericsons Plan 4, 111 64 Stockholm, Stockholms Lan
description: Radisson Blu Waterfront Hotel is located amongst Stockholm's popular shopping district, just a short walk from Cityterminalen Central Bus Station. It features panoramic city views and 4-star rooms. This modern hotel offers meeting rooms, luggage storage and valet parking. Welcoming and professional staff are available 24 hours a day. Those staying at Radisson Blu Waterfront Hotel Stockholm can enjoy the luxurious rooms that offer converters/voltage adaptors, a private bathroom and a mini bar. Hot drinks can be made with the available tea and coffee supplies, and enjoyed in the comfort of the room's living area. Radisson Blu Waterfront Stockholm is located in the heart of Stockholm’s entertainment district with restaurants, cafés and nightlife on the doorstep. Guests can also visit the Royal Swedish Opera, Kungstradgarden and Nordiska Kompaniet.Revato

name: Courtyard by Marriott Stockholm Kungsholmen
description: Courtyard Stockholm Kungsholmen invites you to experience 4-star comfort and award-winning convenience. Located in the city center, our hotel offers the best of both worlds: a sense of urban sophistication, plus the calm and tranquility of nature, thanks to our close proximity to Rålambshov's Park. Settle into exceptionally spacious rooms with large windows that let in natural daylight and offer views of the park or the residential area. Challenge yourself to a workout in the modern fitness center, or enjoy a tasty meal at Björk Bar & Grill, a favorite among Stockholm locals. Host your next event with us and take advantage of our sophisticated venues and exceptional planning services. When you're ready to explore, our hotel places attractions like City Hall and Old Town within your reach - and we offer bike rentals, so you can discover Stockholm on two wheels. Your 4-star escape awaits.Marriott

name: Elite Hotel Marina Tower
description: Situated right by Saltsjö Bay, Elite Hotel Marina Tower offers free WiFi and rooms with flat-screen cable TVs. Stockholm city centre is a 10-minute bus ride away. All rooms at Elite Marina Tower Hotel feature contemporary furnishings and wooden floors. Some rooms include a small seating area and a work desk. The hotel’s outside seating offers magnificent views of the bay and Djurgården island. Both Swedish and international meals are on offer at the in-house restaurant. A buffet breakfast is served every morning 06:30-09:30 weekdays and 07-11:00 on weekends. The vibrant Södermalm district is a 5-minute walk away. The nearest bus stop is within 50 metres. The neighbouring Saltsjökvarn Brygga ferry terminal offers connections to Djurgården, as well as Nybrokajen harbour in Östermalm.

name: Unity Hammarby Sjöstad Stockholm
description: Located in Stockholm, 1.9 km from Sickla Beach and 3.7 km from the centre, UNITY Hammarby Sjöstad provides air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and a fitness centre. Private parking is available on site. The aparthotel offers a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a hair dryer, free toiletries and walk-in shower. A fridge, a stovetop and kitchenware are also provided, as well as a kettle. A continental, vegetarian or vegan breakfast is available daily at the property. At UNITY Hammarby Sjöstad you will find a restaurant serving European cuisine. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy skiing nearby, or make the most of the sun terrace. Tele2 Arena is 1.7 km from UNITY Hammarby Sjöstad, while Fotografiska - Museum of Photography is 3.6 km away. The nearest airport is Bromma Stockholm Airport, 15 km from the aparthotel.

name: Gothia Towers & Upper House
description: Welcome to Gothia Towers! The perfect choice for both business travellers and leisure guests. Here you can enjoy a wide range of facilities - all under one roof, next door to the Swedish Exhibition & Congress Centre. In addition to hotel rooms you will find a flower shop, spa, café, restaurants, bars, conference rooms, banquet and exhibition halls. You will find a total of 1184 great rooms in all three of Gothia Towers’ imposing towers – with everything from that little something extra to a real touch of extravagance. Enjoy great comfort and tasteful décor and furnishings in our well-equipped double or family rooms. The majority of our rooms also boast wonderful views of the city. Gothia Towers is located in central Gothenburg, right in the thick of things on Korsvägen, just a couple of blocks from the main boulevard Avenyn. We are close to the city centre with excellent transport links, right next to Scandinavia's largest amusement park, Liseberg, Universeum science centre as well as concert and sport arenas like Scandinavium and Ullevi stadium. We offer several different restaurants and bars with everything from light meals in our café to modern à la carte dining. Come and enjoy breakfast, brunch, lunch or dinner. Or why not drop in for a beer, a glass of wine or other beverages? We have something for all taste buds and every occasion. As a guest at Gothia Towers you have discounted access to Upper House Spa, with a protruding champagne pool, Gothenburg’s highest hammam, saunas, an experience shower and a relaxation suite, where you can enjoy and take in the incredible views. Gothia Towers has been designed for exciting meetings, and for planned meetings we offer both small and really large conference facilities. We have options to meet your requirements and can tailor a conference or meeting to suit your needs.bestwestern.com

name: Hotel Riverton
description: Hotel Riverton is a contemporary independent design hotel located centrally in Gothenburg by the waterfront which is fully family-owned and operated since 1991. With personal care and attention to detail in every aspect of our guests experience, we've integrated the feeling of comfort, charm, and style combined with excellent food and drink experiences.Explore our story from our rooftop bar and restaurant to our rejuvenating spa and the comforts of our bedrooms making us the perfect destination for those who love unfussy luxury. Beautifully situated by the harbour entrance in Gothenburg, Hotel Riverton is located in the city centre and within walking distance to the Opera, the Casino and the chic shopping scene of Kungsgatan, Avenyn, NK and Nordstan. The charming old town and the picturesque Haga district is within a short stroll.Lindholmen Science Centre is just a ferry ride over, from Stenpiren which is a hub for trams, ferries and bus services, located 250 m from the Hotel. In summer time we highly reccomend to take one of the summer boats departing from Stenprien which takes you out to the gorgeous archipelago of Gothenburg. Within the hotel, there are two restaurants and one lobby bar, including View Skybar & Restaurant which is home to spectacular panoramic views across the Gothenburg harbour. Enjoy one of our award-winning cocktails in the bar or experience our a la carte menu from the 12th floor. Give yourself a break and unwind in our new Serenity Spa when staying with us in Gothenburg. Enjoy the inviting atmosphere and recover in our indoor pool, aromatherapy, steam or dry sauna or relax at your own pace in our Spa Lounge. We also offer a brand-new gym with the latest cardio machines from Precor, free weights and cardio technology from Preva. Please note, the minimum age requirement to enter the Spa facilities is 18 years old, from 16 years old if accompanied an adult. *CASH FREE from 1st Januari 2017*iHotelier/iStay

name: MJ's
description: MJ's is located only 50 metres from Lilla Torg Square in central Malmö. This hotel offers free WiFi and rooms with a seating area and flat-screen TV. All rooms at MJ's feature a work desk and beds from Grange, as well as wall-to-wall carpeting. Breakfast is served in MJ’s fresh breakfast garden. Guests are also welcome to enjoy a drink in the bar. Several restaurants are available in the immediate area. The King’s Park with the Malmöhus Castle is a 5-minute walk from the hotel. Malmö Central Station is 300 metres away.

name: Ljungs Fem Rum
description: On the popular island destination of Gotland and just 1.5 km from Visby golf club, Ljungs Fem Rum offers modern rooms with free WiFi. Guests can enjoy a large garden with BBQ facilities. Ljungs Fem Rum consists of accommodation with private bathrooms and a private entrance, each with its own patio or balcony. Each room comes with a kitchenette, a TV, and a sofa-bed in the living/dining area. There is a communal breakfast room at the property, with homemade bread baked daily. The shared living area has sofas and a TV as well as a fireplace. Located in Västergarn, there is a swimming beach within 10 minutes’ walk of the property. Visby town is 23 km to the north, with buses running regularly to a bus stop just 50 metres from Ljungs Fem Rum.

name: Clarion Hotel Winn
description: When you need to plan a get-together, choose the smoke-free Clarion Hotel Winn in Gavle, SE near the University College of Gavle, Baltic Sea, Swedish Railway Museum, Mackmyra Whisky distillery and the Valbo Shopping Centre. Amenities at our pet-friendly hotel include free breakfast, free wireless high-speed Internet, a restaurant, free weekday newspapers, an indoor heated pool, meeting space and a business center with copy, print and fax services. All guest rooms have standard room amenities. Book now to connect with family, friends and colleagues. Children 12 and under stay free if sharing room with parents or grandparents when no extra bedding is required. Please note that all Choice Hotels in Scandinavia are non-smoking properties. Pet accommodations are available, please contact the hotel for more information.Choice Hotels

name: Hotel Gio, BW Signature Collection
description: Welcome to the home of Gio! April 1st 2020, Hotel Gio, BW Signature Collection opens the doors to a meeting place for the ones who wants to live, eat, socialize and work in a warm and undemanding environment. At Gios, you can stay for a short while, or for a longer visit, eat relly good food at Mama Gios, have a drink at the terrace or work in the living room. At Gios you will come home to a grand family. In the large living room there are possibilities to work or socialize with friends. That is why we call Gio "the social hub hotel". Here you will also find Mama Gio, a restaurant that focuses on straight forward hospitailty and simple, well cooked food that tastes really, really good. Gios rooms has an ambience of Italy in the 50's, both the standard double rooms and the slightly larger longstay rooms for those who wants to stay a little longer, or comes back time and again. There are also family rooms that comfortably houses the whole family when needed. Hotel Gio, BW Signature Collection is located right next to the park of Haga, where parts of the royal family resides, and within walking distance you will fiend Friends arena, Mall of Scandinavia and the Karolinska hospital. Right outside the hotel, the buses to Stockholm centre and Arlanda airport has a stop. The center of Stockholm is reached within 12 minutes, and Arlanda airport within 40 minutes. In the living room there is room to work or just to relax, or why not mingle with your colleagues? We can arrange mingle or events for up to 150 people, but we also have meeting rooms if you need a smaller space. After 60 years of office workers walking the stairs, through the doors and looking at the artwork, we now open the doors for the guests of Hotel Gio, BW Signature Collection.bestwestern.com

name: ArenaHotellet i Uppsala
description: Located 1.4 km from Gränbystaden shopping centre, ArenaHotellet i Uppsala features a restaurant, bar and views of the city. Free private parking is available on site subject to availability. The city centre is 4 km away. All rooms have a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Certain units have a seating area where you can relax. You will find a 24-hour front desk and children's playground at the hotel. Children can also enjoy the Playstation and Xbox consoles in the game room. Linneaus museum and garden are 4.5 km from ArenaHotellet i Uppsala, while Uppsala Konsert & Kongress is 5 km away. The nearest airport is Arlanda Airport, 40 km from the property.

name: Radisson Blu Arlandia Hotel, Stockholm-Arlanda
address: Kabinvaegen 3, P O Box 103, 190 60 Arlanda, Stockholms Lan
description: Set in Arlanda, this modern hotel features valet parking, a 24-hour reception and an express check-in and check-out feature. Just moments from Stockholm-Arlanda Airport, it offers a stylish stay in a convenient location. Radisson Blu Arlandia Hotel provides rooms equipped with converters/voltage adaptors, tea and coffee making facilities and a mini bar. They provide an in-room safe, a laptop safe and a private bathroom. Those staying at Radisson Blu Arlandia Hotel can sample international dishes at the in-house restaurant, suitably situated for those who want to stay nearby for a meal. There are a variety of restaurants and cafés near Radisson Blu Arlandia Hotel, and Rosersberg is an easy car ride away.Revato

name: Lysebu Hotel
description: Lysebu Hotel is located at Tryvannshøyden Hill above Oslo, 750 metres from the Voksenkollen metro station. It offers excellent dining, free WiFi and free private parking. All rooms at Hotel Lysebu have a work desk, and a private bathroom with shower. Some rooms feature a flat-screen TV and views of Sørkedalen Valley and Norefjell Mountain. The in-house restaurant serves Norwegian cuisine and features large panoramic windows and Nordic art on the walls. The restaurant offers a new 5-course menu every week, based upon seasonal ingredients and accompanied with selected wines. During summer, guests can dine out on the terrace. The hotel has a wine cellar and can arrange wine-tasting sessions. Art exhibitions and live music events are sometimes hosted by the hotel. Other facilities include a large garden, an indoor swimming pool and a lounge with fireplace. Popular activities among guests include skiing, hiking and cycling. Oslo city centre is a 40-minute metro ride away.

name: Scandic Kokstad
description: Situated in Bergen, Scandic Kokstad offers contemporary 4-star accommodation, as well as a sauna. It also provides meeting rooms, a 24-hour reception and free bicycle rental. Equipped to ensure a comfortable stay, rooms at Scandic Kokstad offer a desk, heating and a flat-screen TV. They all feature ironing facilities and a telephone. On-site dining options include a restaurant, which is an ideal spot to have a meal. In the evening, guests are invited to relax in the lounge bar.Revato

name: Thon Hotel Bergen Airport
description: Thon Hotel Bergen Airport is 2.5 km from Bergen Flesland Airport and a 15-minute drive from central Bergen. It offers rooms with free WiFi and a breakfast buffet. The rooms include a writing desk, cable TV and a minibar. Tea and coffee-making facilities are provided in each room. Restaurant offers a French-inspired menu as well as classic Norwegian dishes. A light menu and evening cocktails are served in the hotel’s sleek bar. Thon Hotel Bergen Airport also has a fitness centre and squash courts. Thon Hotel Bergen Airport is an environmentally friendly hotel and is registered with the Eco-Lighthouse programme.

name: Clarion Hotel Trondheim
description: When you need to plan a get-together, choose the smoke-free Clarion Hotel Trondheim in Trondheim, Norway near the Nidarosdomen Cathedral. Our pet-friendly hotel is also near the Akerhus Fortress landmark, Rock and Roll Museum, Bakklandet and Sverresborg. Enjoy hotel amenities like free breakfast, free wireless high-speed Internet and copy, print and fax services. All guest rooms have HDTVs, pillow top mattresses, down pillows, fluffy robes and more. Book now to connect with family, friends and colleagues. Pet accommodations are available, please contact the hotel for more details. Children 12 and younger stay free when they share the same room with their parents or grandparents if no additional bedding is required.Choice Hotels

name: Clarion Hotel The Edge
description: When you need to plan a get-together, choose the smoke-free Clarion Hotel The Edge in Tromso, NO near local landmarks. Enjoy hotel amenities like breakfast, free WiFi, meeting rooms and conference facilities, to name a few. All guest rooms have standard room amenities. Book now to connect with family, friends and colleagues. Pet accommodations are available for a small fee, contact the hotel for more information.Choice Hotels

name: Quality Hotel Expo
description: The smoke-free Quality Hotel Expo is located in the beautiful Fornebu, Norway area of Oslo. Right on the scenic seaside, this pet-friendly hotel provides you with a friendly Scandinavian atmosphere. Different sites to visit while in the area include Engineering Expo, Lysaker Brygge, Henic Onstad Kunstsenter and Sandvika Storsenter. Enjoy hotel amenities such as free breakfast, a popcorn machine, free weekday newspapers, picnic areas, bicycle rentals, an exercise room, free wireless high-speed Internet, a coffee bar and shop and more. Guest rooms come with refrigerators, flat-screen TVs, mini bars, down pillows and more. Book now.Choice Hotels

name: Radisson Blu Airport Hotel, Oslo Gardermoen
description: The hotel provides 4-star accommodation in Gardermoen, just minutes from Oslo Airport Gardermoen. It also features a currency exchange, a coffee bar and a 24-hour reception. Rooms at Radisson Blu Airport Hotel Oslo Gardermoen provide a stylish space to relax, complete with a mini bar. They all include an in-room safe, a private bathroom and tea and coffee making facilities. Radisson Blu Airport Hotel Oslo Gardermoen provides a range of places to have a meal, including After Gate & Terrace and Toots Bar. Each evening, guests are welcome to wind down in the comfortable lounge bar. Either a buffet or a continental breakfast is served daily. Radisson Blu Airport Hotel Oslo Gardermoen has easy access to the Norwegian Armed Forces Aircraft Collection. Jessheim and Lillestrom are also an easy car ride away.Revato

name: Hotell Refsnes Gods - by Classic Norway Hotels
description: Housed in a 18th-century mansion on Jeløy island, Hotel Refsnes Gods features a large collection of Scandinavian art. Each room has a private bathroom and cable TV. WiFi and parking are free. All rooms at the historic Refsnes Gods feature a minibar, tea/coffee facilities and work desk. Some rooms include a seating area, while others have a private, furnished balcony overlooking the Oslofjord. Restaurant Munch has a well-stocked wine cellar and offers a wide variety of dishes including sea food. Breakfast is served daily. Guests enjoy access to a sauna and the hotel's beach. Other facilities include a large surrounding garden. Nearby activities include golf, fishing and diving. Moss city centre is situated 3 km from the hotel. Søndre Jeløya Nature Reserve is within 15 minutes’ walk from the hotel.

name: Scandic Park Sandefjord
description: Scandic Park Sandefjord is situated in Sandefjord and is close to the area's popular attractions. It offers complimentary Wi-Fi, an indoor pool and a sauna. The hotel has a gym with a swimming pool. Corporate amenities include meeting rooms. Rooms at Scandic Park Sandefjord are well-appointed and offer a private bathroom, a telephone and a refrigerator. There are also a number of rooms geared towards families. Guests staying at Scandic Park Sandefjord can sit down to a unique dining experience at the in-house restaurant, conveniently situated for those who want to stay close when looking for a bite to eat. In the evening, guests can relax in the comfortable lounge bar. A wide selection of dining options are also found in close proximity to the property. Scandic Park Sandefjord is within a short walk of the Sandefjord Museum. It is within a 20-minute stroll of Sandefjord Railway Station, which allows convenient access in and around Sandefjord.Revato

name: Førde Pensjonat
description: No description found

name: Radisson Blu Resort, Trysil
description: Location Located in the heart of the ski resort area, the hotel offers its guests premier access to 65 ski slopes and 32 lifts, as well as the quaint shops and restaurants of the town centre in Trysil. Facilities The establishment comprises a total of 220 accommodation units. The upper floors are easily accessible using the lift. Services such as a cloakroom and currency exchange facilities make for a comfortable stay. Internet access and wireless internet access are available in the public areas. Gastronomic options include a restaurant, a dining area, a breakfast room, a café and a bar. Shopping facilities are available. Children can have fun playing in the garden. Additional features of the establishment include a newspaper stand and a playroom. Guests arriving by car can park their vehicles in the garage or car park. Additional services include room service and a laundry. Rooms All accommodation units feature air conditioning, central heating and a bathroom. Bathrooms with wheelchair access can also be booked. A balcony completes the range of amenities available in most rooms. Each accommodation unit features a double bed, a queen-size bed, a king-size bed or a sofa-bed. A safe and a minibar also feature. The accommodation units offer a range of amenities, including tea and coffee making equipment. Convenient features include internet access, a telephone, a TV, a radio and wireless internet access. Wheelchair-accessible rooms are also bookable. In the bathrooms, guests will find a shower and a hairdryer. Sports/Entertainment The establishment offers various options for cooling off on hot days, including a children's pool and an indoor pool. Various refreshing drinks are available from the poolside bar. Leisure options available for a fee at the establishment include golf, horse riding, canoeing and bowling. The area around the establishment offers good cross-country skiing opportunities, making it the perfect choice for fans of winter sports. A disco and a kids' club complete the range of options available. Meals Various meals and board options are bookable. Guests can choose from breakfast, lunch, dinner, B & B and half board. Payment The following credit cards are accepted at the establishment: American Express, VISA, Diners Club, JCB and MasterCard.WebBeds
